channel.title: Erase xp by a command
channel.description:
I want to make a command that resets all skills to 1. Its deltascape client, and you add xp by addSkillXP(amount, skillid);. So the question is how to decrease the xp from lvl 99 to 1.
Plz message back.

item.title: Erase xp by a command
item.dc:creator: @maxinator33 maxinator33
item.description:
@maxinator33 wrote:

Well it’s like i want to make a command ::pure, that puts def level on 1, and atk,str,mage,range,prayer,hp on 99. I know how to add the xp, but not how to erase it. Thanks for the quick responses btw, but could you help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Erase xp by a command
item.dc:creator: @beastyboy77 beastyboy77
item.description:
@beastyboy77 wrote:

their are ::setlevel commands that lets you go from a 99 to 1 for example “::setlevel 1 1” or 1 to 99 example “::setlevel 1 99”…

Read full topic
